# Welcome {-}

This contains solutions to the exercise in [*R for Data Science*](http://amzn.to/2aHLAQ1), by Hadley Wickham and Garret Grolemund [@WickhamGrolemund2017].
The website for that book is [r4ds.had.co.nz](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/), and a physical
copy is published by O'Reilly Media and available from [amazon](http://amzn.to/2aHLAQ1).
